WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
Now i have an xlsx file that is getting generated from an MSaccess db. the xlsx file is this "[test](http://www.scaledrop.net/czindia/czindia/image/test.xlsx)" . it shows the error 'Export/Import: Invalid number of worksheets, 8 worksheets expected'. Im not able to figure out why , ive even changed the expected headings as per this file....ive tested my code with other files before, the code is working fine.
WorkItem.Summary: Export/Import: Invalid number of worksheets, 8 worksheets expected

Comments.Message:
__What__ shows the error "Export/Import: Invalid number of worksheets, 8 worksheets expected"? 

Are you using PHPExcel to create this file, and having problems? Are you trying to read this file using PHPExcel, and having problems?

What is your code?

Unless you can explain the problem to me, and show me what you do to find this problem, there's not much I can do to fix it
Somebody please help me!! I ve always recieved help here!

Actually, its been quite some time since this issue occurred. I don't even have the code with me now. but  i remember that the problem got solved when i undid all the changes i had made to the file and redid most of the work. I didn't understand till the end what the problem was. Thanks for the help.. Ill try this if i encounter the problem again.
